Speech
Speech Timeout (sec) settings.key.speech.timeout Ends voice input after a couple of seconds if unable to recognize command.
Speech Noise Timeout (sec) settings.key.speech.noise.timeout Ends voice input after a couple of seconds when waiting for command with noise in the background.
General Settings settings.key.general.light.enable.lights
Activation Commandz settings.key.general.light.activation.command
Dim/Brighten Step (%) settings.key.general.light.dim.brighten.step When using the voice commands "Brighter" and "Dimmer", this will increase/decrease the light percentage by the inputted amount.
Lights Automation Scenarios Automation Properties
Disable Automation Upon Wifi settings.key.light.auto.disable.wifi Do not automate lights when wifi connects after being disconnected for a period of time. Lights normally adjust brightness to the time of day.
Disable Automation On Startup settings.key.light.auto.disable.startup Do not automate lights when app starts. Lights normally adjust brightness to the time of day.
Disable Sunset Automation settings.key.light.auto.sunset.automation.disable Do not turn lights on gradually when the sun is setting.
Sunset Automation Steps settings.key.light.auto.sunset.automation.step Set how many steps automation increases the light brightness during the time the sun goes down.
Sunset Step Duration (sec) settings.key.light.auto.sunset.automation.step.duration Set the duration of the change in light brightness. The larger the value, the more smooth and more unnoticeable the change is.
Automate Regardless of Input settings.key.light.auto.even.user.interacts If a user changes the lights using this app, automation is disabled until the next day. This ignores that and always enables light automation.
Restrict Automation to SSID settings.key.light.auto.lock.to.network Light automation uses the local network to discover and adjust lightbulbs. You can force automation to a specific SSID.
Enter SSID settings.key.light.auto.enter.ssid SSID not specified
Automate Lights Till settings.key.light.auto.night.time
Max Automated Brightness settings.key.light.auto.max.automated.brightness Please set the maximum brightness that the light automation will use.\n Value: %
Hardcode Location settings.key.light.location.hardcode.location When automating the lights, it needs the location to calculate sunset. You can hardcode the location so the app never asks for location. This makes automation faster without needing to query location if set for one location.
